Package game.action

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AttackAction
    Action to allow actors to be attacked by player or Allosaur.
    BreedAction
    Action to allow actors to breed.
    DrinkAction
    Action to allow dinosaurs to drink from a lake.
    DropFruitAction
    Action to allow fruits to be dropped.
    EatActorAction
    Action to allow actors to be eaten.
    EatItemsAction
    Action to allow many items to be eaten in a single turn.
    EndGameAction
    Action to allow the game to be terminated by the player.
    FeedActorAction
    Action to allow actors to be fed.
    PickFruitAction
    Action to allow fruits to be picked up.
    VendingAction
    Action to allow the vending machine to be used.
